documents.document: Use what you’ve been through as fuel, believe in yourself and choose to be unstoppable. ~Yvonne Pierre
Don’t be pushed by your problems, be led by your dreams. ~Ralph Waldo Emerson
Always believe that something wonderful is about to happen. ~Sukhraj S. Dhillon
If you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up.
Always remember, others may hate you, but those who hate you don’t win unless you hate the man then you destroy yourself. ~Richard M. Nixon
Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake? ~Da Vinci
Life contains but two tragedies. One is not to get your heart’s desire; the other is to get it. ~Socrates
Never judge your success by how high up the ladder you get, judge it by how high u bounce when u fall off and hit the bottom.
When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It’s to enjoy each step along the way. ~Wayne Dyer
Private victories precede public victories. You can’t invert that process any more than u can harvest a crop before u plant it. ~Stephen Covey
The poor, the unsuccessful, the unhappy, the unhealthy are the ones who use the word tomorrow the most. ~Robert Kiyosaki
Whosoever desires constant success must change his conduct with the times. ~Machiavelli
The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good. ~Samuel Johnson
He that would live in peace and at ease must not speak all he knows or all he sees. ~Benjamin Franklin
Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting. It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
That men do not learn very much from the lessons of history is the most important of all the lessons of history. ~Aldous Huxley
Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. ~Mark Twain
Daring ideas are like chessmen moved forward. They may be beaten, that they may start of winning game. ~Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
If you have hope in the future you will have power in the present! ~Chris Voss
It is better to be hated for who you are than to be loved for what you are not. ~Andr Gide
Sometimes you make mistakes. It’s best to admit them quickly and get on with improving your other innovations. ~Steve Jobs
One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors. ~Plato
Just because something ended doesn’t mean it never should have been. Remember, you lived, you learned, you grew and you moved on.
Little kindness and courtesies are so important. In relationships, the little things are the big things. ~Stephen Covey
It is better to look ahead and prepare than to look back and regret. ~Jackie Joyner-Kersee
I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe. ~Dalai Lama
A man can be short and dumpy and getting bald but if he has fire, women will like him. ~Mae West
The only difference between a tax man and a taxidermist is that the taxidermist leaves the skin. ~Mark Twain

Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It’s not something you learn in school. But if you haven’t learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven’t learned anything. ~Muhammad Ali
If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself, and then make a change. ~Michael Jackson
Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful. ~Norman Vincent Peale
The reason that ego and love are not compatible comes down to this: you cannot take your ego into the unknown, where love wants to lead. ~Deepak Chopra
We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they’re called memories. Some take us forward, they’re called dreams. ~Jeremy Irons
God has perfect timing; never early, never late. It takes a little patience and faith, but it’s worth the wait.
Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for. ~Joseph Addison
You have to believe in yourself when no one else does that makes you a winner right there. ~Venus Williams
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate. ~Oprah Winfrey
I’ve seen and met angels wearing the disguise of ordinary people living ordinary lives. ~Tracy Chapman
Don’t choose the one is beautiful to the world, but rather, choose the one who makes your world beautiful.
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
Enjoy what you do and take pride in it because then you will do it well. ~Charlie Bigham
Don’t allow your mistakes from yesterday to determine the joy you experience today. Learn from your past and move on. Choose to be happy.
Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final. ~Roger W. Babson
If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change. ~Wayne Dyer
Gratitude is when memory is stored in the heart and not in the mind. ~Lionel Hampton
Nothing much happens without a dream. For something really great to happen, it takes a really great dream. ~Robert Greenleaf
The only person who never makes mistakes is the person who never does anything. ~Denis Waitley
We are like islands in the sea, separate on the surface but connected in the deep. ~William James
Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. ~Corinthians
There are darknesses in life and there are lights, and you are one of the lights, the light of all lights. ~Bram Stroker
The people who matter will recognise who you are. ~Alan Cohen
One is always a long way from solving a problem until one actually has the answer. ~Stephen Hawking
You gain confidence and grow stronger by every experience in which you really push yourself to do something you didn’t think you could do.
The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work. ~Emile Zola
The way to change others’ minds is with affection, and not anger. ~Dalai Lama
Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving. ~Henry Ford
The people who truly matter will never turn their back on you through the hardest times. Forget the people who do. You don’t need them.
What you hear, you forget; what you see, you remember; what you do, you understand. ~Confucius
You’re not going to fall for the right person until you really love yourself and feel good about how you are. ~Henry David Thoreau
He who has a thousand friends has not a friend to spare, while he who has one enemy shall meet him everywhere. ~Ralph Waldo Emerson
A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way. ~John C. Maxwell
Good things come to those who believe, better things come to those who are patient, and the best things come to those who don’t give up.
Doing ordinary things in an extraordinary way, will assure you of an extraordinary future. ~Zig Ziglar
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength. ~Arnold Schwarzenegger
When you focus on problems, you’ll have more problems. When you focus on possibilities, you’ll have more opportunities.
I can accept failure. Everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying. ~Michael Jordan
Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there. ~Will Rogers
No one can have a peaceful life who thinks too much about lengthening it. ~Seneca
I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful. ~Marilyn Monroe
The word impossible is not in my dictionary. ~Napoleon Bonaparte
When we stop opposing reality, action becomes simple, fluid, kind, and fearless. ~Byron Katie
Confidence is a habit that can be developed by acting as if you already had the confidence you desire to have. ~Brian Tracy
Life is a cycle, always in motion, if good times have moved on so will times of trouble!
It isn’t sufficient just to want - you’ve got to ask yourself what you are going to do to get the things you want. ~Richard D. Rosen
The higher order of logic and understanding that is capable of meaningfully reflecting the soul comes from the heart. ~Gary Zukav
A failure establishes only this, that our determination to succeed was not strong enough. ~John Christian Bovee
For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don’t believe, no proof is possible. ~Stuart Chase
While you complain and blame, you remain the same. ~Hakim Muhammad
Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough. ~T.S. Eliot
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. ~Winston Churchill
Believe me, the reward is not so great without the struggle. ~Wilma Rudolph
We have to learn to be our own best friends because we fall too easily into the trap of being our own worst enemies. ~Robert Thorp
Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world. ~Lucille Ball
You have to hurt in order to know. Fall in order to grow. Lose in order to gain. Because many of life’s lessons are learned in pain.
Every actual state is corrupt. Good men must not obey laws too well. ~Ralph Waldo Emerson
It is not, what a lawyer tells me I may do; but what humanity, reason, and justice, tells me I ought to do. ~Edmund Burke
Do not cry for the past is gone, do not stress about the future has not arrived, live in the present and make it awesome.
It is dangerous to be right when the government is wrong. ~Voltaire
Never underestimate the power of human stupidity. ~Robert Heinlein
Sometimes it takes the worst pain to bring about the best change.
No statement should be believed because it is made by an authority. ~Robert Heinlein
Anyone who fights for the future lives in it today. ~Ayn Rand
Where there is no peril in the fight, there is no glory in the triumph. ~Pierre Corneille
When you confront a problem you begin to solve it. ~Rudy Giuliani
If you care enough for a result, you will most certainly attain it. ~William James
A person who is nice to you, but rude to the waiter, is not a nice person. ~Dave Berry
Most of the mistakes in thinking are inadequacies of perception rather than mistakes of logic. ~Edward de Bono
You don’t know what the future holds, but you know who holds it. Trust God!
Life’s battles don’t always go to the stronger or faster man. But sooner or later the man who wins, is the man who thinks he can. ~Vince Lombardi
